scripts.deploy_to_text_prod: gcloud beta functions deploy wavToTextProd  --trigger-resource teraconn_voice_for_transcription             --trigger-event google.storage.object.finalize --region asia-northeast1 --memory 256 --timeout 540 --runtime nodejs8
scripts.deploy_to_16k_prod: gcloud beta functions deploy wavTo16KhzProd --trigger-resource teraconn_raw_voice                           --trigger-event google.storage.object.finalize --region asia-northeast1 --memory 256 --timeout 540 --runtime nodejs8
scripts.deploy_to_ogg_prod: gcloud beta functions deploy wavToOggProd   --trigger-resource teraconn_raw_voice                           --trigger-event google.storage.object.finalize --region asia-northeast1 --memory 256 --timeout 540 --runtime nodejs8
scripts.deploy_to_text_dev: gcloud beta functions deploy wavToTextDev   --trigger-resource teraconn_voice_for_transcription_development --trigger-event google.storage.object.finalize --region asia-northeast1 --memory 256 --timeout 540 --runtime nodejs8
scripts.deploy_to_16k_dev: gcloud beta functions deploy wavTo16KhzDev  --trigger-resource teraconn_raw_voice_development               --trigger-event google.storage.object.finalize --region asia-northeast1 --memory 256 --timeout 540 --runtime nodejs8
scripts.deploy_to_ogg_dev: gcloud beta functions deploy wavToOggDev    --trigger-resource teraconn_raw_voice_development               --trigger-event google.storage.object.finalize --region asia-northeast1 --memory 256 --timeout 540 --runtime nodejs8
